metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1107 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The analyzeCurrent function in ape/apeproperties.cpp in TagLib 1.7 and earlier allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a crafted sampleRate in an ape file, which triggers a divide-by-zero error.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtag1v5 - 1.7.1-3
libtag1v5-vanilla - 1.7.1-3
libtagc0 - 1.7.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: taglib package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.1-3').
